Hi, I'm Gary

I’m a digital creative with hard skills in e-commerce web development, web design, video production pre and post, motion graphics, graphic design, photography, and videography. Spending years working in diverse teams, I have developed soft skills in leadership, interpersonal communication, teamwork, adaptability, and problem-solving. I currently work for Country Rebel as their Creative Team Lead, where I manage a team of video creatives with the mission to create the best acoustic music performance videos on the internet today.

I am currently looking for new opportunities. Let's connect!
